directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease and flour one 9x13 inch cake pan.
Mix all ingredients and pour into prepared pan.
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 55 minutes.
ingredients: 1 (3.5 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix
8 (1 ounce) squares German sweet chocolate, grated
title: Heavenly Cake
